articles.title: Birthday of Youth League Marked
articles.content:
Birthday of Youth League Marked
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- An arts performance took place at the Central Youth Hall on Monday to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 It was given by the arts squad of the League Central Committee.
					
					 Its colorful numbers included "Song of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League" and "Young People, Forward under the Guidance of the Party".
					
					 The performers sang of the course of victory and glory covered by the Youth League and the self-esteem of the young people working feats at construction sites for a thriving nation.
					
					 Enjoying the performance were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the C.C., the Youth League, officials concerned and youth and students.

articles.title: Korean Youth League Anniversary Marked
articles.content:
Korean Youth League Anniversary Marked
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- A room for education in the youth movement feats of President Kim Il Sung was set up at the Central Youth Hall in Pyongyang on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League. 
					 Thousands of soldiers of the Korean People's Army, young workers and students have visited it for the past few days.
					
					Visiting the room they look back on the youth movement feats by Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who have always maintained it as the revolutionary strategic line to attach importance to the army and the youth alike.
					
					 Drawing their particular interest are data showing the leadership exploits by Kim Il Sung who originated the Juche-based youth movement.
					
					 Also impressing them are historic data showing that Kim Jong Il ushered in the golden age of the Korean youth movement.

articles.title: Young People Play Key Role in Building Thriving Nation
articles.content:
Young People in DPRK Play Key Role in Building Thriving Nation
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Young people in the DPRK successfully overcame the arduous march, the forced march and have displayed the wisdom and courage of young vanguard in the efforts to open a gate to a thriving nation for the past 15 years.
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il made sure that the youth league was named after President Kim Il Sung and awarded to it a flag bearing his portrait in January 1996.
					
					 Young people have performed heroic feats in building edifices in the era of Songun including the Youth Hero Highway, the Kumgangsan Youth Railway, Thaechon Youth Power Station No. 4 and Ryesonggang Youth Power Stations Nos. 1 and 2. 
					
					 Those in four pilot sectors and other various fields of the national economy have made breakthrough in building an economic power through shock brigade campaign.  
					
					 Young scientists and technicians have made big progress in the core and basic technologies including IT, Nano technology and bio-engineering and the latest scientific and technological development, positively contributing to pushing ahead with technological updating of the national economy.
					
					 Winners of Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize and numbers of model primary organizations of youth vanguard have been on increase during these days.
					
					 400 units and more than 2,690 members of the youth league were awarded Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize. At least 7,770 primary organizations won the title of thrice model primary organizations of youth vanguard.
					
					 The youth are performing miracles and innovation in building the Huichon Power Station, the Paektusan Songun Youth Power Station, in the construction sites of 100,000 flats now underway in the capital and other places.

articles.title: DPRK's Youth League Praised
articles.content:
DPRK's Youth League Praised 
Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Foreigners praised the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League for its heroic feats for nation's prosperity and people's happiness.
					Young Koreans have always devoted themselves to the revolution, rallied close around their great leader, said the general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru.
					
					The Korean youth movement has greeted its heyday in the era of Songun, demonstrating its invincibility in the drive to defend socialism against the U.S., he added.
					
					No youngsters in the world work so hard as Korean youth for the prosperity of their country with profound trust in their leader, said the chairman of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung.
					
					It is the greatest ideal of young Koreans to become heroes in the worthwhile struggle for the prosperity of the country, said the chief of a branch of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea.
					
					The Korean youth will surely build a thriving socialist nation in their country in the near future under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, he added.

articles.title: 300 Literary Pieces Created
articles.content:
300 Literary Pieces Created
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Korean writers created more than 300 literary pieces in the New Year. They waged agitation for increased production in different fields of the national economy.
					 Those of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea went to the Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex and other units in the capital while those of North Hamgyong Province, South Phyongan Province, North Hwanghae Province and other places to the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the Chollima Steel Complex, the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon, etc.
					
					 Typical poetry includes "We Are Descendants of the Great Leader" and "With the Spirit of Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and the Spirit of Korea" and prose writings include "At the Riverside of Pothong" and "Coalfield Alive with High-pitched Drive".
					
					 More than 200 wall poems were put on display at worksites.

articles.title: Folk Winter Games Brisk
articles.content:
Folk Winter Games Brisk
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- There are folk games which Koreans like to play in winter.
					 Yut game is the most popular one of them.
					
					 Four yut sticks, one side of each being flat and the other side round. The result of playing is decided when they remain on the flat side or round side after each throw. This game is popular among families and frequent national yut competitions take place. 
					
					 A tug of war is also popular among Koreans in winter. 
					
					 Korean children like very much top spinning in winter as it is good for their physical training. 
					
					 One of the favorite games for children is kite-flying which begins early in winter and reaches its height in the 15th of the first month, January. 
					
					 Among the favorite winter folk games are sleigh-riding, playing with toy pinwheel and shuttlecock.

articles.title: Solid Foundation Laid for Boosting Agricultural Production
articles.content:
Solid Foundation Laid for Boosting Agricultural Production
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has a good prospect for increasing grain production and rapidly developing stock-breeding, pomiculture, fish breeding, etc. This is the fruition of the dynamic drive which has been under way to boost agriculture under the grand plan of the Workers' Party of Korea since the outset of the new century.
					Land realignment has made rapid progress in the country. North Phyongan Province realigned more than 53,000 hectares of land, South Hwanghae Province at least 100,000 hectares and South Phyongan Province and Pyongyang City over 94,400 hectares.
					
					 Hundreds of thousands of hectares of paddy and non-paddy fields have been realigned in various parts of the country as befitting the land of socialist Korea. The projects led to obtaining a large area of new cropland.
					
					 Taegyedo Tideland has been reclaimed to bring a large area under plough in North Phyongan Province. Hundreds of hectares of Punjiman Tideland were successfully reclaimed in Ongjin County, South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Kaechon-Lake Thaesong, Paekma-Cholsan and Mirubol gravity-fed waterway projects were completed to supply a sufficient amount of irrigation water to districts of Pyongyang and Nampho Cities and dozens of cities, counties and districts of South and North Phyongan Provinces and North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 A signal turn has been effected in seed selection and advanced agro-technique and farming methods have been introduced to put agriculture on a modern and scientific basis. Good examples were set in double cropping, bean cultivation, etc.
					
					 Fresh successes in potato farming were reported from cities and counties of Ryanggang Province and villages in alpine areas of Jagang and South and North Hamgyong Provinces.
					
					 The Kosan Fruit Farm is turning into the nation's leading fruit producer in the wake of the appearance of the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm as a model in fruit farming.
					
					 There appeared in various parts of the country hosts of modern stock-breeding and fish-breeding bases. Advanced methods for producing meat and fish have been applied on the basis of latest science and technology.
					
					 The Namhung Youth Chemical Complex succeeded in building a large-scale anthracite gasification process to mass-produce fertilizers by use of raw materials found in abundance in the country while the gasification process project is now progressing at a final phase at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					
					 Agricultural workers in the DPRK are now busy making good preparations for the farming this year, while consolidating the existing foundation, in hearty response to the joint New Year editorial which set the agricultural field as the lifeline for settling the issue of people's living.

articles.title: Signal Successes Reported from Pilot Sectors of National Economy
articles.content:
Signal Successes Reported from Pilot Sectors of National Economy
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Coal, electric power and metal industries and railways, the pilot sectors of the national economy in the DPRK, are reporting signal successes in their drive to provide strong backing to light industry whose development is the main thrust of the general onward movement this year.
					 The Sunchon Area Youth Coal Complex, the Tokchon Area Coal Complex and other coalfields in the western part of the country are keeping the coal production going at a high rate by reinforcing the manpower for tunneling and securing reserve cutting faces. The Kaechon Area Coal Complex is registering ever greater successes in tunneling everyday through a socialist emulation while the Kangdong Area Coal Complex is overfulfilling its national economic plan everyday on all indices. 
					
					 The Pukchang and Pyongyang thermal-power complexes are ensuring the normal operation of generators by increasing the number of them at work. The production of electricity is on the steady increase at the East Pyongyang Thermal-power Plant, Sunchon Thermal-power Plant, Jangjingang Power Station, Taedonggang Power Station and the Sodusu Power Station as the efficiency of equipment there has been raised while the time of their repair and maintenance is cut down as much as possible. 
					
					The Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex is energetically pushing forward the work to reinforce the iron production system operating with locally available resources and boost the efficiency of oxygen converters and ingoting machines to a higher level. The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex is busy with the technological updating of the process for the production of heavy duty rail, while overfulfilling its daily plan more than 30 percent. The Musan Mining Complex successfully carried out the blasting of 150,000 cubic meter earth to provide a sufficient quantity of quality concentrated iron ore to iron and steel works. Other enterprises in the field of metal industry are supplying iron and steel to light industry on a priority basis.
					
					 The domain of railway transport carried out the New Year's transport quota at 102.6 percent. It is reporting more signal successes by working out the detailed plan for transporting freight to construction sites in time and minutely organizing and commanding the transport services. 
					
					 The Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex developed AC locomotive "Songun Red Flag" No. 1 equipped with asynchronous adhesion motors while the Wonsan Railway Rolling Stock Complex produced a lot of new freight cars.

articles.title: KCNA Dismisses Reckless Remarks of Senior Japanese Official
articles.content:
KCNA Dismisses Reckless Remarks of Senior Japanese Official
Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Nakano in charge of issues of "abduction" of Japan on Jan. 14 let loose a spate of invectives terming the DPRK "dictatorial state" and the like. 
					 What he uttered was so vulgar and mean that one can hardly think this was mouthed by a member of the Cabinet. 
					
					 His remarks were based on the extreme bitterness toward the DPRK as was the case with all political tricksters handling affairs related to abduction. 
					
					 What matters is that he made the above-said remarks when the issue of resuming dialogue between the DPRK and Japan is on the agenda and strong voices are heard from the international community calling for defusing the tension on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia through negotiations. It must not go unnoticed that these outbursts were let loose right after the emergence of the new Cabinet in Japan. 
					
					 This shows that the Japanese ultra-right conservative forces including Nakano are making a blatant challenge to the atmosphere of dialogue, being uneasy about it, and leaving no means untried to bar the new Cabinet from coming out to resume the dialogue. 
					
					 No wonder, he cried out for employing every possible means and method to tighten sanctions against the DPRK. 
					
					 Experts on abduction including Nakano have employed the same method for hampering the solution of the pending issues between the DPRK and Japan to fish in troubled waters. 
					
					 It was sheer nonsense that he painted the regime in the DPRK as "an improper group" while describing Japan as a "democratic state". 
					
					 Japan is seeking revenge for its defeat in the war while advocating "peace in the East". The "building of a war state" pushed forward by the Japanese reactionaries is a challenge to freedom and democracy as it is aimed at restoring the order of unchallenged domination over Asia. 
					
					 Japan is not qualified to talk about democracy. It is keen to repeat its blood-stained past history and, at the same time, free with politically motivated terrorism, wantonly violating the democratic national rights of the Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 The ruling quarters of Japan should be branded as an improper group and its state as a dictatorial one.
					
					 The international community should be vigilant against the dangerous moves of the Japanese right-wing forces.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Nationwide Efforts in Agriculture
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Nationwide Efforts in Agriculture
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- All the people should bring about a radical turn in grain production this year and thus conclude the march for great surge with shining victory.
					 Rodong Sinmun made this call in an editorial Monday.
					
					 The agricultural front is the lifeline for solving the problem of people's living, and to bring about an innovation in agricultural production is the key to opening the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation, the editorial said.
					
					 Good crop will be helpful to speeding up the drive for great surge in light industry and all other fields of the national economy and reinforcing the military strength, it said, adding:
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK witnessed great changes in the work to consolidate the material and technical foundations for the rural economy and the socialist rural construction over the last 10 odd years.
					
					 Land rezoning and building of gravity-fed waterways were carried out on a large scale and many rural villages turned into socialist fairyland.
					
					 Seed revolution was pushed ahead, new farming technique and methods developed and material and technical foundations laid to produce fertilizer and other farming materials and equipment.
					
					 Many modern stock-raising and fruit-producing bases were built to organically combine agricultural production with stockbreeding and develop them together.
					
					 The ongoing drive for increased grain production is an honorable and worthwhile work to bring into reality the intention of the WPK to solve the problem of people's living at any cost. It is also a responsible work to open the gate to a thriving nation next year.

articles.title: S. Korea: Jail Term Sentenced to Citizen Praising DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korea: Jail Term Sentenced to Citizen Praising DPRK
Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Central District Court on Jan. 14 sentenced to jail an inhabitant on charges of violating the ill-famed "National Security Law", according to CBS of south Korea.
					The court gave this sentence for the mere reason that the citizen posted on Internet articles and animation files praising the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Stop Scheme for Military Tie-up with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Stop Scheme for Military Tie-up with Japan
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The Bar Association for Democratic Society and other civic and social organizations in south Korea issued a joint statement on Jan. 14, urging the authorities to halt seeking military tie-up with Japan.
					 The statement noted that debate on conclusion of south Korea-Japan military agreement is going on in earnest over the present aggravated situation of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 This is aimed to legalize advance of Japan's "Self-Defense Forces" into the peninsula in "contingency" and lay a springboard for the U.S.-Japan-south Korea military alliance, so far forwarded, the statement pointed out, adding: It is a very dangerous act of threatening peace of the peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The authorities should promptly halt the scheme for military tie-up with Japan, a move posing threat to peace, it urged.

articles.title: S. Korean Minister of Unification Urged to Opt for Dialogue
articles.content:
S. Korean Minister of Unification Urged to Opt for Dialogue
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Hyon In Thaek, south Korean minister of Unification, should lend an ear to the voice of the nation and come out for the earliest dialogue and improvement of relations between the south and the north, the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification said in a commentary on Jan. 13.
					 Hyon set a "doorsill of dialogue" on Jan. 11, doubting whether the DPRK was "sincere" when it made the proposal for dialogue and negotiation, according to the commentary.
					
					 It blamed him for questioning the "sincerity" of the DPRK which called for ending confrontation and holding dialogue and negotiations for peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula out of broad magnanimity.
					
					 Hyon has totally denied the June 15 joint declaration and suppressed the democratic forces working hard to reunify the country by pooling efforts of the Korean nation, it said, querying is he entitled to talk about "sincerity."

articles.title: US Accused of Wire-pulling S. Korea-Japan Military Talks
articles.content:
US Accused of Wire-pulling S. Korea-Japan Military Talks 
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. was behind south Korea-Japan defence ministerial talks that took place in Seoul to conclude a bilateral military agreement, the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. said in a commentary on Jan. 12.
					 It accused the U.S. of contemplating driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 It pointed out that south Korea and Japan have boosted their military nexus according to the U.S. scenario.
					
					 The military alliance among the U.S., Japan and south Korea being knocked into shape at a faster pace with the U.S. backing threatens peace and stability in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia, the commentary added.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to positively opt for creating the atmosphere of the north-south dialogue, not stirring up a war.

articles.title: Finnish Party Hails DPRK Proposal
articles.content:
Finnish Party Hails DPRK Proposal
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The Finnish Communists' League in a statement on Jan. 10 expressed belief that the important proposal of the DPRK would be materialized without fail.
					 The League acknowledged that the joint statement of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations fully reflected the invariable and patriotic policy of the peace-loving Workers' Party of Korea and DPRK government to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the Korean Peninsula, said the statement.
					
					 It further went on:
					
					 The League hopes that the Korean people will register successes in the work to implement the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung for national reunification and ensure peace and security on the peninsula.
					
					 It strongly demands that the south Korean authorities immediately respond to the DPRK's proposal and that the U.S. imperialists put an end to their domination over south Korea and discontinue their anti-DPRK moves.

articles.title: S. Korea Urged to Accept DPRK's Proposal for Dialogue
articles.content:
S. Korea Urged to Accept DPRK's Proposal for Dialogue
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries issued statements on Jan. 10 in support of the joint statement made by the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					 The Finland-Korea Society in its statement noted that the joint statement clearly showed the firm will of the Korean people to ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula and realize the country's reunification at any cost.
					
					 The society fully supports Korea's peaceful reunification and will work hard to introduce the DPRK's cause of independent and peaceful reunification to the Finnish people, the statement stressed.
					
					 It strongly urged the south Korean authorities to unconditionally accept the DPRK's affirmative, peaceful and patriotic proposal for dialogue and negotiations and stop their war moves and confrontation policy against the DPRK at once.
					
					 The Indonesian Federation of Transport Workers Unions in its statement demanded that the south Korean authorities accept the DPRK's important proposal without delay and that the U.S. conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 The federation fully supports all the proposals advanced by the DPRK to defend the country's sovereignty and prevent a war on the Korean Peninsula and expresses firm solidarity with the Korean people in their efforts for peaceful reunification of the peninsula, the statement added.

articles.title: Full Support to Proposal of DPRK Called for
articles.content:
Full Support to Proposal of DPRK Called for
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- The Arab Socialist Party of Egypt issued a statement on Jan. 10 in support of the joint statement of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					 It warmly hailed the proposal made in the joint statement and urged the south Korean authorities to respond to it.
					
					 Their attitude toward this proposal will be a criterion showing whether they want peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula and national reunification or not, said the statement.
					
					 The Party will as ever consistently support the Korean people in the efforts to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country and achieve national reunification, it said.
					
					 It called upon all the progressive political parties and people of the world to actively support the DPRK's proposal.
					
					 That day the Communist Party of India, too, released a similar statement.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand for Reunification Supported
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand for Reunification Supported
 Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Megawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, hailed the principled stand and sincere efforts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government for peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula.
					 We are sure that the Korean people under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il will successfully carry out the tasks laid down in the joint editorial for this year and win a decisive victory in accomplishing the cause of national reunification, she said on Jan. 12 when meeting Jong Chun Gun, DPRK ambassador to her country.
					
					 She also expressed sympathy with the DPRK's joint editorial, saying that the outstanding leadership ability of Kim Jong Il was demonstrated on the highest level last year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated in Uzbekistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated in Uzbekistan
						
Pyongyang, January 17 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan on Jan. 13 formed a preparatory committee for celebrating February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The committee decided to hold a meeting, seminar, photo exhibition and other colorful events.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Fabrica de Vidrio de Taegwan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Fabrica de Vidrio de Taegwan
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Vidrio de Taegwan que ha aplicado en el alto nivel la tecnologia CNC.
					  Recorriendo largamente los talleres de elaboracion y montaje y otros lugares, averiguo en detalles la situacion de reconstruccion tecnica y de produccion.
					
					  Al ver las maquinas modernizadas segun la tecnologia CNC y otros varios productos, se puso muy satisfecho de que los obreros de la fabrica hayan dado un gran salto en la produccion de articulos de vidrio al realizar magnificamente la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de procesos productivos y aprecio altamente los meritos de ellos.
					
					  Volvio a evaluar altamente los orgullosos meritos de los militantes del partido y otros trabajadores de la fabrica diciendo que ellos, que guardan en su corazon la consigna del partido "!Que conquisten la cumbre de la tecnologia de punta!", son los precursores que transformaron el sistema productivo segun los requerimientos de CNC y asi demostraron en la practica la superioridad de esa tecnologia sofisticada al estilo coreano.
					
					  Califico de muy alta la calidad de los productos de esta fabrica y prosiguio que deben aprender el modo de creacion de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de la fabrica que aseguraron el caracter cientifico, la precision y la alta velocidad de los procesos productivos concentrando las fuerzas en la renovacion tecnica y avanzan sin cesar a la cumbre de tecnologias de punta.
					
					  Indico que la ciencia y la tecnica son la fuente inagotable de bienes materiales y la clave para convertir cuanto antes a nuestra patria en la potencia invencible y verdadero paraiso del pueblo en prosperidad.
					
					  El Dirigente se reunio con la tornera joven Pak Yong Hui y otros obreros para averiguar como ellos trabajan y viven y estimularles cordialmente su trabajo.
					
					  En su recorrido por los establecimientos culturales y de servicio publico, se mostro contento de que la fabrica haya facilitado magnificas condiciones de vida a los obreros.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la administracion y la produccion de la fabrica.
					
					  Al termino de la visita de orientacion, el Dirigente vio la funcion del grupo de agitacion artistica movil de la fabrica y aprecio las entusiastas actividades artisticas de sus miembros.
					
					  Finalmente, expreso su gran esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y los obreros de la fabrica seguiran cumpliendo magnificamente el papel de vanguardias en el cumplimiento de la politica economica del partido.
					
					  Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak To Chun, Thae Jong Su y Kim Phyong Hae, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, y Ju Kyu Chang, miembro suplente del BP y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion en homenaje al 65o aniversario de fundacion de la UJS
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion en homenaje al 65o aniversario de fundacion de la UJS
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en la Casa Central de la Juventud la funcion del grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil dedicada al 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung.
					En la escena se pusieron diversas piezas como la narracion y cancion "Cancion de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung", la cancion con guitarras "Adelante jovenes siguiendo al partido" y el duo femenino "Lo dira nuestro futuro".
					
					Los ejecutantes cantaron en tono orgulloso la trayectoria de la UJS llena de victorias y glorias y la dignidad de los jovenes que crean meritos en los campos de construccion de la gran potencia prospera. 
					
					Disfrutaron la funcion el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, el primer secretario del Comite Central de la UJS, Ri Yong Chol, y otros funcionarios junto con los jovenes y estudiantes.

articles.title: Movimiento de Japon que rompe el clima de dialogo
articles.content:
Movimiento de Japon que rompe el clima de dialogo
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ATCC) -- El ministro encargado del problema de secuestro de Japon, Nakano, calumnio el dia 14 a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea calificandola de "Estado dictatorial". 
					Esta calumnia es demasiado irracional y baja para ser pronunciada por un ministro.
					
					Al igual que los dichos de todos los estafadores politicos japoneses que se dedican a la industria de secuestro, los insultos de Nakano parten tambien de la hostilidad extremada a la RPDC.
					
					El problema es que el pronuncio tales palabras inmediatamente despues de la aparicion del nuevo gabinete en Japon y en estos momentos en que esta sobre el tapete el problema de reanudacion del dialogo entre Corea y Japon y se alzan en la sociedad internacional las voces en demanda del relajamiento de tension en la Peninsula Coreana y el Nordeste Asiatico mediante las negociaciones. 
					
					  Esto muestra que las fuerzas ultraderechistas y conservadoras de Japon como Nakano desafian frontalmente al clima de dialogo y el nuevo gabinete pretende frenar de todos modos el reinicio del dialogo entre Corea y Japon.
					
					  No es casual que Nakano haya abogado por "recurrir a todos los medios posibles" para intensificar la sancion a la RPDC.
					
					  Los expertos en la industria de secuestro como el vinieron obstaculizando de esta manera la solucion de los problemas pendientes entre Corea y Japon y sacando provechos de ello. 
					
					  Es muy absurdo que Nakano haya calificado a la RPDC de "colectivo contradictorio" y a Japon de "Estado democratico". 
					
					  Japon preconiza por una parte la "paz del Oriente" y por la otra, acecha la oportunidad de tomar la venganza de su derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial. 
					
					  La construccion del "Estado de guerra" de Japon es un desafio a la libertad y la democracia porque se encamina a recuperar el orden de dominacion dictatorial sobre Asia.
					
					  Japon no tiene la cara para hablar de la democracia, ya que intenta repetir su historia ensangrentada y comete el terror politico violando despiadadamente los derechos nacionales democraticos de los coreanos residentes en su territorio. 
					
					El Estado dictatorial y contradictorio es precisamente Japon.
					
					La sociedad internacional debe observar con vigilancia el peligroso movimiento de las fuerzas derechistas japonesas que actuan en contrasentido al dialogo.

articles.title: Sentada en Corea la base de produccion Agricola
articles.content:
Sentada en Corea la base de produccion agricola
						
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ATCC) -- Segun el gran proposito del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, se ha librado en el nuevo siglo en Corea la dinamica campana para desarrollar la agricultura. Por consiguiente, quedaron abiertas las perspectivas para aumentar la produccion de cereales y lograr el desarrollo vertiginoso en la ganaderia, la fruticultura, la piscicultura, etc.
					Fueron ordenadas en la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte mas de 53 mil hectareas de tierra cultivable, en la de Hwanghae del Sur, mas de 100 mil hectareas, y en la de Phyong-an del Sur y la ciudad de Pyongyang, mas de 94 mil 400 hectareas. 
					
					En ese curso, se han estandarizado en escala nacional centenares de miles de hectareas de arrozales y secanos como tierra de la Corea socialista y se buscaron muchos terrenos nuevos. 
					
					En la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte aparecio el polder Taegyedo, equivalente a la superficie de areas cultivables de un distrito entero, mientras que en el distrito de Ongjin de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur se ha construido el polder Punjiman de centenares de hectareas. 
					
					Los canales de corriente natural, incluyendo el Kaechon-lago Thaesong, el Paekma-Cholsan y el de la llanura Miru, posibilitan irrigar suficientemente los arrozales de decenas de ciudades, distritos y municipios de las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, de Phyong-an del Norte y de Hwanghae del Norte, las ciudades de Pyongyang y Nampho.
					
					Se ha impulsado con exito la innovacion en el cultivo de semillas y se han aplicado las tecnicas y metodos avanzados de cultivo, gracias a lo cual se ha elevado el nivel de modernizacion y cientifizacion de la agricultura y se han creado los ejemplos en el doble cultivo al ano y en el cultivo de soya, etc.
					
					Ademas, las ciudades y distritos de la provincia de Ryanggang y las areas montanosas de las provincias de Hamgyong del Norte y del Sur alcanzan nuevos cambios en el cultivo de patatas. 
					
					La Granja Fruticola Combinada Taedonggang se ha construido como modelo de fruticultura y le sigue ahora la Granja Fruticola de Kosan. 
					
					  Por doquier del pais, se han levantado muchas bases modernas de ganaderia y de piscicultura, basadas en las ciencias y tecnologias sofisticadas.
					
					  Por otra parte, el proceso de gasificacion segun antracita construido en el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung posibilita producir los abonos con los abundantes recursos nacionales. Y el Complejo de Abonos de Hungnam impulsa en etapa final la construccion del proceso de gasificacion.
					
					En pleno acato al editorial conjunto del Ano Nuevo que presenta el frente agricola como sector vital para el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo, los agricultores coreanos preparan perfectamente ahora las faenas agricolas de este ano ampliando y consolidando los cimientos preparados ya.

articles.title: Exitos de lucha de la juventud coreana en los ultimos 15 anos
articles.content:
Exitos de lucha de la juventud coreana en los ultimos 15 anos 
Pyongyang, 17 de enero (ATCC) -- Pasaron 15 anos desde cuando el Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo denominar la Union de la Juventud con el nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung y conceder a ella la bandera con la efigie de este.
					Durante los 15 anos desde entonces, los jovenes coreanos manifestaron la inteligencia y la audacia de vanguardias juveniles en la lucha por concluir victoriosamente la marcha penosa, la forzada, y abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera. 
					
					En las creaciones monumentales de la epoca del Songun como la autopista Chongnyonyongung, la ferrovia juventud del monte Kumgang, la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud no. 4 de Thaechon y las otras no. 1 y no. 2 de Ryesonggang, estan grabados los meritos heroicos de los jovenes coreanos.
					
					Los jovenes, que trabajan en varios dominios de economia nacional, incluso 4 sectores prioritarios, abrieron la brecha de la construccion de potencia economica mediante sus actividades de brigada juvenil.
					
					Los cientificos y tecnicos juveniles alcanzaron exitos en las tecnologias basicas y sofisticadas como la IT, la nanotecnologia y la biotecnologia, e hicieron gran aporte a acelerar la reconstruccion tecnica de economia nacional. 
					
					En esos dias, 400 unidades y mas de 2 mil 690 miembros de la Union de la Juventud recibieron el Premio de Honor Juvenil Kim Il Sung y mas de 7 mil 770 organizaciones de base obtuvieron 3 veces el titulo de Organizacion de Base Ejemplar Vanguardia Juvenil.
					
					Ahora los jovenes crean milagros e innovaciones en los campos de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon, la Juventud Songun de Paektusan y de las viviendas para 100 mil familias en la capital.
